member.name: T:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector
member.summary: This class provides a connection to the SQLite database-file. Its methods get or save files from/to the DB.

member.name: F:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.settings
member.summary: Sets the connection string. User gives path to .db file.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.checkDataBaseExistance
member.summary: Gets database path out of config file, checks if the database file exists.
member.returns: bool. true: file exists, false: file does not exist or invalid path in .exe.config file.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.checkDataBaseExistance(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if database file exists at given path.
member.returns: bool. true: file exists, false: file does not exist.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.setDatabasePath(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataBaseConnector class. Creates needed database tables if they do not exist yet.
member.param: File path of the SQLite database.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Dal.DataBaseConnector.createDataBase
member.summary: Connect to the database and create its tables if they do not exist yet.

member.name: T:EPUBackoffice.Program
member.summary: The main entry class of the application.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Program.Main
member.summary: Main entry point of the application.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Form1.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True, wenn verwaltete Ressourcen gelöscht werden sollen; andernfalls False.

member.name: M:EPUBackoffice.Form1.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: T:EPUBackoffice.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:EPUBackoffice.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:EPUBackoffice.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
